```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(stars)
```

```{r}
wdpa<- st_read("../data/WDPA_Jul2020-shapefile0/WDPA_Jul2020-shapefile-polygons.shp") 
```

```{r}
hotspots<- st_read("../data/hotspots/hotspots_revisited_2004_polygons.shp")
```

```{r}
pa_hotspots <-st_intersection(wdpa, hotspots)
```


```{r}
pa_hotspots$area <- st_area(pa_hotspots$geometry)
wdpa$area <- st_area(wdpa$geometry)

st_write(pa_hotspots, "../data/pa_hotspots.shp")
```

```{r}
pa_hotspots <- st_read("../data/pa_hotspots.shp")
```

```{r}
z<- pa_hotspots %>% select(-geometry)

yrs<- z %>%
  group_by(STATUS_YR) %>%
  summarise(area = sum(area))
```
